Job Title: Parts Planning Analyst 
Department: Planning & Procurement – PV Business 
Location: Chennai, Head Office (with pan-India travel as required) 
Employment Type: Full-Time 
Reporting To: Head – Planning 
 
Company Overview 
TVS Automobile Solutions is a leading player in India’s automotive aftermarket ecosystem, 
offering innovative, tech-enabled solutions in service, diagnostics, and parts distribution. 
With a commitment to operational excellence and customer satisfaction, we are transforming 
the way vehicle care is delivered across the country. 
 
Position Summary 
We are seeking a results-driven, analytically strong Parts Planning Analyst to join our 
Planning & Procurement team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for driving inventory 
efficiency, enhancing catalog readiness, ensuring MSL (Minimum Stocking Level) 
adherence, reducing inventory days, and enabling daily replenishment planning across 
locations. This role provides exposure to strategic planning, high-impact problem-solving, 
and nationwide supply chain coordination. The position offers significant growth potential for 
individuals with a strong academic pedigree and deep analytical acumen. 
 
Key Responsibilities 
 Ensure Catergory-wise availability planning aligned with demand trends, vehicle 
models, and seasonal consumption. 
 Monitor and manage inventory levels to maintain MSL compliance and optimized 
Inventory Days. 
 Drive Daily replenishment planning using dynamic demand-supply models. 
 Coordinate cross-functional initiatives to support Dark store expansion and regional 
availability. 
 Utilize advanced analytics and statistical tools to forecast demand, track service 
levels, and identify performance gaps. 
 Support the development and validation of the Product Catalog in coordination with 
sourcing and tech teams. 
 Execute inter-location stock transfer strategies to ensure availability while minimizing 
excess inventory. 
 Generate actionable dashboards and reports using Excel and BI platforms for 
management decision-making. 
 Collaborate closely with Sourcing, Logistics, Catalog, and Field Operations to deliver 
availability KPIs. 
   
Preferred Qualifications 
 Graduate or Postgraduate from a Top B-School or Tier-1 Engineering Institution. 
 Formal education or certifications in Data Analytics / Applied Statistics / Supply 
Chain Analytics is an added advantage. 
 Prior experience in Automotive spare parts or Aftermarket planning will be a 
strong plus. 
 Mandatory Language Fluency in English / Hindi / Tamil is required.  
 
Key Competencies & Skills 
 Strong analytical mind-set with deep skills in statistics, forecasting, and scenario 
modelling. 
 Proficiency in Excel, Power BI, and data-driven decision tools (Power Query, SQL 
basics, R or Python preferred). 
 High attention to detail and ability to interpret data patterns for actionable insights. 
 Effective communication and coordination skills to drive alignment across teams. 
 Agility in responding to evolving business demands and supply-side constraints. 
 
Career Development Opportunity  
This role provides access to a structured Career Development Program, which includes: 
 Mentorship by Senior Leaders in Supply Chain, Catalog, and Strategy. 
 A Customized Training Roadmap covering analytics tools, planning 
methodologies, and operational execution. 
 Exposure to Cross-Functional Leadership Initiatives, setting the stage for rapid 
career growth in the automotive aftermarket industry. 
 
Compensation & Benefits 
Details will be communicated by the Human Resources team during the interview process.

Job Description: Brand Manager  Position Overview: The Brand Manager will be responsible for developing and executing brand strategies to enhance brand equity, drive market share, and achieve profitable growth. Onboarding partners to execute strategies, including managing relationships with external stakeholders like advertising agencies, media partners, and vendors Performance Metrics and Reporting: Data Analysis: Specify the need for analyzing sales data, campaign performance, and other key metrics to measure the effectiveness of brand initiatives. Education: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. MBA preferred. Skills: Strong strategic thinking and analytical skills Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities Creative mindset with the ability to innovate and think outside the box Proficiency in digital marketing and social media management Strong project management and organizational skills

the concept of a “ Free Credit Score”  in the country.

continue in the same role or request for assignment into a specific area of their choice.

Company Information
CapitaLand Group (CapitaLand) is one of Asia’s largest 
diversified real estate groups. Headquartered in 
Singapore, CapitaLand’s portfolio spans across 
diversified real estate classes which include integrated 
developments, retail, office, lodging, residential, and 
new economy sectors such as business parks, 
industrial, logistics, and data centers. with a presence 
across more than 260 cities in over 40 countries, the 
group continues to expand its market in Singapore, 
China, India, Australia, Japan, South Korea, Europe, 
and the USA.
CapitaLand Investment India (CLI India) has deep 
expertise across the full real estate value chain in India 
– from owning, developing and managing properties to 
fund management through CapitaLand India trust 
(CLINT) and private funds.  The Group has a strong 
presence in India with a portfolio of over 20 business 
and IT parks, industrial, logistics, lodging and data 
centre assets across eight cities – Bangalore, Chennai, 
Goa, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Mumbai and Pune.

Job Description Summary
Primary Job responsibilities
The Management Associate will work closely with key 
departments including Marketing, Customer Service, 
Finance, Projects, and  Property Management 
This position is ideal for someone who has a strong 
aptitude for coordination, excellent communication 
skills, and a keen interest in learning about the 
operations of the real estate industry. 
• Rotational Assignments: Participate in a series of business rotations 
across various functions (e.g., Strategy, Operations, Marketing, 
Finance, etc.) to gain a comprehensive understanding of the 
business.
• Data-Driven Decision Making: Analyze business trends, market 
insights, and financial data to provide actionable recommendations to 
senior leadership.
• Leadership Development: Build and hone leadership capabilities 
through training, mentorship, and hands-on management of cross-
functional teams.
• Stakeholder Engagement: Engage with internal and external 
stakeholders, including senior executives, customers, and partners, to 
drive business outcomes.
• Innovation & Process Improvement: Contribute to process innovation, 
operational excellence, and identifying new business opportunities in 
line with company objectives.
• Performance Reporting: Track key performance metrics and report on 
progress related to ongoing projects, initiatives, and business 
outcomes.
Pre-requisites
• Master’s degree in Business Management with  2+ yrs. experience.
• Passion for the real estate industry and desire to grow within it.

clients through rapid innovations, BPM, digital and technology innovation work.

Target is an iconic brand, a Fortune 50 company and one of America’s leading retailers. Be a part of a team as a Guest Data Platform Product Data Analyst working to set direction for the enterprise to maximize strategic value of our guest data, while simultaneously upholding rigorous standards for data privacy and ensuring compliance with current and future data privacy laws.  A product data analyst will turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions. Business decisions could include, but are not limited to, product feature prioritization, data strategy, use case business impact assessment, and/or A/B test rollout decisions. Product data analyst responsibilities include conducting full lifecycle analysis to include requirements, profiling, and design. Product Data analysts will develop analysis, ad-hoc, and operating reporting and dashboard capabilities. They will also monitor performance and quality control plans to identify improvements to guest data quality.  As a steward of guest data, a Product Data Analyst is accountable to engage with business owners, product owners, engineering, and architecture to create data definitions, data quality rules, and exception guidelines. Classify data based on Personally Identifiable Information (“PII”) and other parameters that helps manage data as an enterprise asset.  Responsibilities: Interpret data, analyze results, and provide ongoing reports, analysis, and/or dashboards that measure guest data health and product OKRs. Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets to inform GDP roadmap. Work with product management to inform use case prioritization by using data to make decisions on size, scope, and expected business impact of use case implementation. Set-up & measure results from A/B tests using enterprise testing tools. Job Description: Account Manager  Position Overview:
The Account Manager will be responsible for maintaining long-term strategic relationships with clients, ensuring the successful delivery of services, and identifying opportunities for growth through cross-selling and up-selling. This role combines client engagement, project coordination, and strategic planning to maintain and expand key client accounts. Key Responsibilities: Client Relationship Management Act as the primary liaison for client communications, ensuring expectations are clearly defined and met. Build and maintain long-term relationships with key client stakeholders to foster trust and loyalty. Manage onboarding processes, coordinating with stakeholders for a smooth start to engagements. Operational Oversight Maintain and extend existing Statements of Work (SOWs) through proactive client engagement. Conduct daily stand-up meetings (internal), Weekly Status Reviews (WSR), Monthly Business Reviews (MBR), and Quarterly Business Reviews (QBR). Monitor and ensure timely submissions of timesheets, invoicing, and collections to maintain compliance and financial stability. Prepare case studies and success stories to showcase value delivered to clients. Business Development Identify opportunities to cross-sell and up-sell within client accounts by exploring untapped potential ("white spaces"). Conduct White Space Analysis to uncover new areas for engagement and growth. Build customized solutions and client-specific use cases to address pain points and opportunities. Market & Competitor Research Conduct thorough research to understand client needs, market trends, and competitive landscapes. Gather insights and intelligence from internal teams to identify challenges and opportunities. Campaign & Outreach Collaborate with Marketing and Inside-Sales teams to design and execute targeted campaigns for expanding relationships within accounts. Identify and establish relationships with new client contacts to broaden account engagement.  Key Skills and Competencies Strong leadership and proactive decision-making capabilities. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to engage with all levels of client stakeholders. Analytical thinking for White Space Analysis and competitive intelligence. Technical understanding of products and services to offer value-driven solutions. Organizational skills to manage client reviews, reporting, and operational oversight effectively. Strategic mindset for identifying growth opportunities and expanding client accounts. Qualifications BE / B.Tech (IT/CS) with MBA in Marketing/Sales/Operations preferred. Proven experience in account management, client engagement, or business development. Familiarity with CRM tools and market research platforms (e.g., ZoomInfo, Salesforce). Strong understanding of financial operations, including invoicing and collections.  Growth Opportunity Based on candidate’s performance, they would be given opportunities to work / relocate to US offices for Business Development work.

This role offers a fast-track career growth opportunity to advance into senior project management or program management positions within 3-5 years, based on performance and contributions.

text:
Open Position: Associate Technical Project Manager 
 
As Microsoft Power BI Partner of the Year 2021, we enable leading companies to 
accelerate their business intelligence and analytics initiatives. Our solutions enable our 
clients to improve their operations, reduce costs, increase sales, and build stronger 
customer relationships. 
 
We build a strong foundation with architecture and governance frameworks. Our team 
training and best practices ensure optimized reports. We've developed 43 Power BI 
visuals to extend functionality and save decision-makers time, allowing them to focus on 
strategic decisions. 
 
Microsoft Gold Partner Expertise: Trusted for Exceptional Results 
 
• Two Decades of Partnership: We leverage our extensive experience and deep 
understanding of Microsoft technologies, honed over a 20-year partnership, to 
deliver exceptional results for our clients. 
• Microsoft-Recognized Excellence: Our nine Microsoft specializations 
demonstrate our commitment to meeting the highest standards of service 
delivery. 
• Enhanced Implementations: Our clients benefit from this extensive knowledge, 
enabling them to optimize their solutions.  
 
 Global Collaboration, Agile Delivery: Powering Your Success 
           
Our integrated teams in India (Mumbai, Hyderabad, NOIDA) and Redmond, Washington 
bring diverse perspectives and deep technical knowledge. Our daily delivery and 
feedback model ensures rapid progress and allows us to adapt solutions quickly to 
evolving business needs. 
 
Inc. magazine has recognized us for sustained growth by listing us on the Inc. 5000 list eleven 
times – a rare honor. 
 
 
Engineering culture 
At MAQ Software, we foster a strong engineering culture with a can-do attitude. Our key managers   
come from excellent educational backgrounds and have considerable experience in growing a 
company and mentoring software engineers. Due to our smaller size, we are agile and able to 
adopt the latest technologies and computing trends ahead of larger industry players.  
 
As a part of our globally distributed engineering team, our engineers gain exposure to the latest 
software engineering practices and fast development cycles, providing them with the opportunity 
to work on challenging technical problems that utilize innovative technologies for fast-paced 
software delivery. Our collaborative and supportive work environment encourages innovation and 
growth, making our company an exciting and rewarding place to work. 
   
Examples of few of our projects: 
• We built an analytics platform for a leading fintech company using Azure services, enabling 
them to scale to 1000+ customers and provide self-service, near real-time analytics. Our 
solution, based on Azure Synapse, Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Data Factory, Azure 
Databricks, and Power BI, followed the best practices of the Azure Well-Architected 
Framework, and leveraged migration strategies from Microsoft’s Cloud Adoption Framework. 
Our automated deployment framework reduced setup time from days to hours. The platform 
 now offers powerful self-service analytics, enabling their customers to reach millions of 
borrowers faster and easily integrate machine learning models for innovation. 
• We helped an organic supermarket chain migrate to Microsoft Power BI and Azure Synapse to 
improve their reporting and data analytics capabilities. The previous system was time-
consuming, error-prone, and offered limited visualization and self-service capabilities. With 
the new solution, the client can now perform direct queries between front-end Power BI 
reports and back-end data, enabling real-time insights and a holistic view across teams. 
Azure Synapse also provides higher data security. The migration resulted in automatic report 
generation, reduced operational costs, increased return on investment, and better business 
decisions. 
• We developed a chatbot for the Arizona Department of Economic Security to improve its 
Program Service Evaluator (PSE) training. The chatbot used Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services 
to answer PSE questions based on the policy manual of various state benefit programs. The 
chatbot learned from user feedback and crawled the policy content automatically. The 
chatbot increased evaluation efficiency, reduced senior staff time, and provided 
conversational responses to PSEs. The chatbot integrated seamlessly into the PSEs’ workflow 
and was accessible through a web interface and Skype for Business. 
• Our client, a leader in the energy and utilities sector, needed a scalable solution to analyze 
large volumes of IoT data from diverse applications. We used Power BI and Azure Data 
Explorer to ingest, transform, and visualize semi-structured JSON data from network logs. Our 
solution reduced the data refresh time, managed dynamic schema changes, and enabled 
comprehensive analysis using Direct Query mode. Our client gained real-time insights and a 
competitive edge in the industry with our robust and effective solution. The solution also 
facilitated efficient data ingestion and transformation, effectively tackled issues pertaining to 
data refresh and dynamic schema of data. 
• We helped a multinational food and beverage chain to improve its sales forecasting accuracy 
by building a hybrid machine learning model on Azure Databricks. The model used historical 
sales, weather, and event data to predict future sales and analyze the impact of a range of 
factors on sales. The model also detected and explained seasonal and daily spikes and lag 
periods. Our model reduced the MAPE value from 0.13 to 0.09 and enabled the client to make 
better business decisions. 
To read about some of our recent projects, visit https://maqsoftware.com/case-studies    
A Typical Day: 
• 8:30 a.m. - Start of Day: Your day begins in the office, setting the tone and preparing for the 
upcoming tasks. 
• 9:00 a.m. - Global Management Meeting: You engage in discussions with the global 
management team, which might include the Principal Consultant and key company 
managers. The goal is to review the previous day's progress and set the day's priorities. This 
often involves a quick review of Azure DevOps (ADO) and emails from US customer teams to 
identify and address any outstanding issues. 
• Morning Scrum: Transition into a daily scrum meeting with a diverse project team, featuring 
developers and project managers from the US and India. This is where you will adapt to 
evolving customer requirements and ensure tasks are effectively delegated, especially if key 
team members are absent. 
• 11:00 a.m. - Best Practices Session: You have the option to join a session focused on the 
security development lifecycle and its implications for your projects. The session typically has 
around 30 team members in attendance. Alternatively, you may opt to spend this time  assessing the latest software build, focusing on its functionality and user experience. 
• Team Lunch: Enjoy a weekly gathering in the cafeteria, a chance for all team members to 
connect and share. Occasionally, meals might be sponsored as a token of appreciation for 
team achievements. 
• Afternoon - Quality Checks and Build Review: Post-lunch, anticipate a fresh build. Your role 
includes ensuring that the quality process team is well-informed, and wiki pages are updated 
with current configurations. There might also be instances where you will collaborate with 
developers to address challenges, refine algorithms, and introduce them to valuable 
resources. 
• One-on-One Meetings: Occasionally, you will have 20-minute individual meetings with team 
members. These sessions offer an opportunity to address specific concerns, provide 
feedback, and align on goals. 
• HR Collaboration: You engage in weekly meetings with the human resources team, focusing 
on team needs, growth strategies, and upcoming interviews. Your input is valuable in these 
discussions. 
• Customer Readiness Review: Your day may also involve reviewing daily software builds and 
status emails, ensuring that everything aligns with customer readiness criteria. 
• Collaboration with Pre-sales Team: From time to time, you will collaborate with the pre-
sales team, offering your insights into RFP responses and validating effort estimates. Your 
expertise, particularly in understanding platforms like Microsoft Azure, will be essential in 
these interactions. 
• 7:30 p.m. - Day's Wrap Up: Your day typically concludes with a comprehensive review, 
ensuring all teams are aligned and informed about the day's outcomes and goals for the 
following day. 
 
Job Description: 
 
We are currently seeking an experienced and motivated Associate Technical Project Manager. The 
ideal candidate should have experience in developing and testing web-based applications, on 
Microsoft and web platforms. Our clientele spans various industries, including retail, technology, 
healthcare, insurance, and more. These clients consist of sales and marketing professionals who 
utilize the internet to connect with consumers and businesses globally. 
 
In this role, you will take on a position of technical leadership, leading a dynamic team in creation 
and deployment of web applications. It is worth noting that in the world of tech-driven companies, 
leadership often arises from technical expertise rather than conventional business backgrounds 
like finance or marketing. Icons such as Bill Gates, Steve Jobs, Larry Page, and Jeff Bezos 
exemplify this trend. Historically, we have observed that individuals grounded in technical 
expertise, coupled with business acumen, thrive in our environment rather than the other way 
around. 
 
Your key result areas as percentage of your overall work items will be:

• Develop functional specifications for projects tailored to Microsoft product teams. 
• Prepare essential customer artifacts, including comprehensive project documentation. 
• Conduct requirement reviews with the team to ensure clarity and alignment on requirements. 
Project Management (~30%) 
• Grasp and manage the complex cross-team interdependencies of projects. 
• Own and ensure the end-to-end delivery of projects within established timelines.  • Handle tasks like planning, optimal capacity utilization, accurate estimation, and regular 
reporting. 
• Consistently meet client expectations regarding schedule and quality, ensuring timely 
reviews. 
• Address and resolve issues swiftly throughout the development, testing, and launch stages. 
• Ensure strict adherence to established methodologies, standards, and procedures. 
Pre-sales Support (~10%) 
• Generate detailed responses to Requests for Information and Proposals. 
• Collaborate closely with technical leads to decipher client requirements and craft appropriate 
solutions. 
• Draft industry-specific and relevant technical whitepapers. 
• Prepare detailed presentations for both sales interactions and corporate meetings. 
• Develop informative case studies based on successful projects. 
• Undertake thorough competitor analysis. 
Business Process Improvement (~15%) 
• Innovate and refine the company's existing process model. 
• Propose enhancements to clients to improve their software development methodology, 
integrating robust project management principles. 
Company Initiatives and Training (~15%) 
• Contribute to company growth by either owning or supporting vital initiatives, such as 
competency development and program managing company projects. 
• Share invaluable knowledge with junior team members through mentoring, code reviews, 
design doc evaluations, technical talks, or as a consultant on projects. 
• Engage with internal teams, external partners, and employees for mutual training benefits. 
• Actively contribute to the company's overarching training initiatives. 
 
Candidate Profile: 
• Bachelor’s degree in computer science/ IT from a reputed university 
• Previous work experience in an IT or Bites firm will be an added advantage. 
• Highly motivated, with multitasking skills and a positive team player 
• Strong customer interaction skills with exposure to international clients 
• Must possess strong process definition and implementation skills. 
• Excellent communication and people skills - able to communicate confidently, clearly, and 
with focus to diverse audiences. 
• Ability to work both independently and in a team environment. 
• Consistent record of progressive responsibility 
 
Experience:  2 – 5 years 
Compensation: CTC 14 - 18 Lakhs p.a. 
Education Criteria: Candidate should have a minimum of 60% throughout the academic career. 
Location: MAQ India Private Limited, A-3, Sector 145, Noida, Gautam Buddha Nagar, Uttar 
Pradesh, 201301 
Workdays: 6-day work week for the first six months; 5-day work week thereafter

decisions.

A Typical Day in Technical Project Manager: 
• 8:30 a.m. - Start of Day: Your day begins in the office, setting the tone and preparing for the 
upcoming tasks. 
• 9:00 a.m. - Global Management Meeting: You engage in discussions with the global  Page 3 of 5  
management team, which might include the Principal Consultant and key company managers. 
The goal is to review the previous day's progress and set the day's priorities. This often involves a 
quick review of Azure DevOps (ADO) and emails from US customer teams to identify and address 
any outstanding issues. 
• Morning Scrum: Transition into a daily scrum meeting with a diverse project team, featuring 
developers and project managers from the US and India. This is where you'll adapt to evolving 
customer requirements and ensure tasks are effectively delegated, especially if key team 
members are absent. 
• 11:00 a.m. - Best Practices Session: You have the option to join a session focused on the 
security development lifecycle and its implications for your projects. The session typically has 
around 30 team members in attendance. Alternatively, you may opt to spend this time assessing 
the latest software build, focusing on its functionality and user experience. 
• Team Lunch: Enjoy a weekly gathering in the cafeteria, a chance for all team members to 
connect and share. Occasionally, meals might be sponsored as a token of appreciation for team 
achievements. 
• Afternoon - Quality Checks and Build Review: Post-lunch, anticipate a fresh build. Your role 
includes ensuring that the quality process team is well-informed, and wiki pages are updated 
with current configurations. There might also be instances where you'll collaborate with 
developers to address challenges, refine algorithms, and introduce them to valuable resources. 
• One-on-One Meetings: Occasionally, you'll have 20-minute individual meetings with team 
members. These sessions offer an opportunity to address specific concerns, provide feedback, 
and align on goals. 
• HR Collaboration: You engage in weekly meetings with the human resources team, focusing on 
team needs, growth strategies, and upcoming interviews. Your input is valuable in these 
discussions. 
• Customer Readiness Review: Your day may also involve reviewing daily software builds and 
status emails, ensuring everything aligns with customer readiness criteria. 
• Collaboration with Pre-sales Team: From time to time, you'll collaborate with the pre-sales 
team, offering your insights into RFP responses and validating effort estimates. Your expertise, 
particularly in understanding platforms like Microsoft Azure, will be essential in these 
interactions. 
• 7:30 p.m. - Day's Wrap Up: Your day typically concludes with a comprehensive review, ensuring 
all teams are aligned and informed about the day's outcomes and goals for the following day.

MLDP Program for Management Trainees  We are pleased to offer you a position in Maya Appliances’ Leadership Development Program (MLDP) for a Management Trainee – Digital & Upstream Marketing at Vidiem. The objective is to groom you into a high-potential Digital & Upstream Marketing Manager by providing structured exposure across our marketing, product development, and sales functions.  MLDP - Maya Appliances’ Leadership Development Program  For: Management Trainee – Digital & Upstream Marketing
Duration: 18-24 months (Subject to change based on organizational requirements)
Final Role: Digital & Upstream Marketing Manager Program Overview This structured rotational program is designed to develop a well-rounded leader capable of driving Vidiem’s digital and upstream marketing efforts. As a trainee, you will undergo hands-on learning across key departments to gain exposure to product strategy, marketing execution, digital platforms, and sales. By the end of the program, you will have:
✅ Strong foundational knowledge of product development and consumer insights.
✅ Hands-on experience in brand marketing, digital strategy, and ecommerce execution.
✅ Practical exposure to sales operations and distributor/channel management.
✅ The ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive business growth.  Rotational Plan & Key Learning Areas 1. Consumer Insights & Product Development (4-6 months) 📌 Objective: Understand consumer needs, develop product concepts, and work with the R&D team.
📌 Key Areas of Exposure: Work with R&D and product management teams on new product development. Analyse customer feedback, market research & competition trends. Participate in product testing and prototype evaluation. Assist in pricing strategy and feature benchmarking. Coordinate with supply chain on cost optimization & production feasibility. 💡 Deliverable: Prepare a competitive product positioning report with recommendations for product innovation.  2. Sales & Channel Management (3-4 months) 📌 Objective: Gain practical exposure to sales, channel strategy & customer behaviour.
📌 Key Areas of Exposure: Shadow field sales teams and meet distributors/dealers to understand market dynamics. Assist in developing trade marketing plans (promotions, incentives, schemes). Work with the ecommerce team to analyze online sales performance. Conduct a pricing & sales performance analysis across channels. 💡 Deliverable: Develop an action plan to improve sales conversion in both offline & online channels.  3. Brand & Digital Marketing (5-6 months) 📌 Objective: Learn how to drive brand communication, advertising, and digital marketing.
📌 Key Areas of Exposure: Work on social media marketing, SEO, and paid digital campaigns (Google, Meta, Amazon Ads). Assist in developing brand storytelling, influencer marketing & content strategy. Manage email marketing, CRM, and customer engagement campaigns. Learn performance tracking: Google Analytics, marketing dashboards & conversion optimization. 💡 Deliverable: Launch a 360-degree digital marketing campaign with clear KPIs.  4. Ecommerce Strategy & Growth (4 months) 📌 Objective: Deep dive into D2C (Direct-to-Consumer) & marketplace ecommerce.
📌 Key Areas of Exposure: Learn about Amazon, Flipkart & Vidiem’s own ecommerce website strategies. Assist in listing optimization, pricing & promotions for digital platforms. analyse customer journey & conversion rate optimization. Work with customer service to understand online consumer feedback. 💡 Deliverable: Develop an ecommerce sales growth plan with key digital levers.  Final Project & Leadership Assessment (2-3 months) 📌 Objective: Apply all learnings in a real-world marketing strategy project.
📌 Key Areas of Exposure: Work cross-functionally with all departments. Develop a strategic marketing roadmap for a new or existing product. Present findings & recommendations to senior leadership. 💡 Final Deliverable: A comprehensive digital & upstream marketing strategy proposal.  Program Completion & Final Role Upon successful completion, you will be assessed based on:
✅ Strategic thinking & analytical skills
✅ Marketing & digital expertise
✅ Ability to lead cross-functional projects
✅ Innovation & problem-solving capabilities Top performers will be promoted to Digital & Upstream Marketing Manager with ownership of product marketing, digital growth, and brand strategy.  Why This Program? 🎯 Develops a high-calibre leader with multi-functional expertise.
🎯 Structured exposure ensures strong domain knowledge & practical experience.
🎯 Hands-on learning with real business impact.
🎯 Aligns with Vidiem’s long-term growth strategy. This program will ensure that you are fully equipped to lead Vidiem’s digital & marketing transformation.  Important Note: -If the objectives are not sufficiently accomplished during the various stages of the program, the management reserves the right to amend, modify, or withdraw the candidate’s participation in the MLDP Program.                                    ________________________________________________________
